title: Unravelling the complex interplay of age, comorbidities, and multimorbidities in COVID-19 disease progression: Clinical implications and future perspectives
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Maria Shoukat, Haseeb Khan, Wajid Munir, Moona Nazish, Abdulwahed Fahad Alrefaei, Mohammed Fahad Albeshr, Anwar Ali, Saad Ahmed, Afsheen Mansoor, Massab Umair, Muhammad Suleman Rana, Malik Badshah
